headline: Show HN: APIs and SDKs to accept borderless payments for goods and services
description:
Integrating a borderless payment gateway is now made easy for developers across various stacks.

Take a look at how easy it is to integrate into a static html page. https://developers.coinforbarter.com/docs/integration-option...
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 接受商品和服务的无边界支付的API和SDKs
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 接受商品和服務的無邊界支付的API和SDKs
